doc.description: AHRS using IMU (accel, gyro) only with Madwick implementation.

configure.name: AHRS_ALIGNER_LED
configure.description: LED number to indicate AHRS alignment, none to disable (default is board dependent)

define.name: AHRS_MADWICK_IMU_ID
define.description: ABI sender id of IMU to use

makefile.raw: ifdef SECONDARY_AHRS ifneq (,$(findstring $(SECONDARY_AHRS), madwick)) # this is the secondary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_SECONDARY_TYPE_H=\"modules/ahrs/ahrs_madgwick_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DSECONDARY_AHRS=ahrs_madgwick else # this is the primary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"modules/ahrs/ahrs_madgwick_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DPRIMARY_AHRS=ahrs_madgwick endif else # plain old single AHRS usage $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"modules/ahrs/ahrs_madgwick_wrapper.h\" endif
